entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider fading unnecessary/trivial discard pattern #58331
    Backlog
  • Source generated file keeps Miscellaneous Files color/message even if features are enabled #58329
    17.2
  • System.InvalidProgramException when constructing a record struct with parameter list and calling the default constructor #58328
    17.2
  • Parameter null checking incorrectly handled in arglist operations #58322
    17.2
  • Parameter null checking only included in IOperation when body is bound #58320
    17.2
  • [LSP] Do not use IsOpen in LSP scenarios #58319
    Backlog
  • Using EnvDTE and vsCMAccess to set an access modifier is causing code deletion #58315
    17.1

Closed

  • Allow customization of auto-generated XML comments #58224
    Backlog
  • Ability to auto add string intrapolation character "$" at the beginning of the string if a valid "{" is typed inside the string. #58223
  • Warn if conversion depends on the order in which interfaces are specified in class base #58258
    Compiler.Next
  • Warning on var-declared variables that are never null assigned #58262
  • C# 10 Global Usings Performance #58279
  • Change of behavior in symbol comparison with SymbolEqualityComparer #58226
  • Parameter null checking needs to ensure testing for use in delegate parameters #58323
    17.2
  • "Name can be simplified" code fix results in invalid code (build error) #57767
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve PROTOTYPE comments in param null checking #58324
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve usability of "enable nullable reference types" refactoring #58316
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Nullable enable GetTypeByMetadataName #58317
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix the bad words in TestDeepAlternation #58330
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58325
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Push classification caching to be an internal detail of semantic classification. #58326
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Check operations when doing type name simplification #58285
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update the status of required members. #58308
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58334
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58333
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Support CodeClass2.Parts returning parts in source generated files #58241
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [LSP] Add semantic token caching for solution open #58238
    Area-IDE
